title: Network Narrative
article: This project is an experiment of reviewing Les Miserables novel by its social network with the help of interractive dashboard which could show some characters information and a number of measurements usually used in social network analysis. The dashboard user interface is designed in a way information about the network could come gradually to the user. Click is the major gesture to interract with the network.

title: Community Detection
article: From time to time, social network analysis requires us to classify the number of groups from a given network. This simple module is a python implementation of a locus based genetic algorithm for community detection. This algorithm is particularly good at detecting communities in which we don't know their number beforehand. This algorithm finds communities by its structure: it classifies densely connected nodes into a group. Although it runs slowly, this algorithm will help us in preliminary analysis of a social network.

title: Covid-19 Dashboard
article: This project was bootstrapped with Create React App. Data visualization using D3 Covid-19 data provided by CovidApi News list provided by NewsApi
